page.title: 17SABBATH OBSERVANCE
page.content: Religion plays a big part in the lives of many people in Harris.There are three denominations-the Free Church, Free Presbyterian and the Church of Scotland,although in Tarbert only the two church buildings.The Free Church people may go to Stornoway but also every year there is a Free Church Conference in Tarbert,sometimes held in the school.Both churches in Tarbert are reasonably near the sea because long ago people used to come to church by boats.The Church of Scotland is bigger than the Free Presbyterian church which is only one hall.The Church of Scotland has one main hall and a smaller hall,the main hall also has a gallery and an upper floor so it seats over 200 people.Harris is very different from many places as the Sabbath is still kept.No businesses or shops are open;no work is done.
